name: Logical matching
short_description: Watch and have fun! Choose from three games: guess what the animals eat, which footprint belongs to each animal and which animal is in the close-up. Learn more about animals while you watch, learn and have fun!
long_description: Watch and have fun! Choose from three games: guess what the animals eat, which footprint belongs to each animal and which animal is in the close up. Learn more about animals while you watch, learn and have fun!

name: Ocean Hide
short_description: Play with ocean stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. There are many different settings, colorful objects and 16 cute animals waiting for you under the sea!
long_description: Play with ocean stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. There are many different settings, colorful objects and 16 cute animals waiting for you under the sea!

name: Stickers in the ocean
short_description: Play with ocean stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. There are many different settings, colorful objects and 16 cute animals waiting for you under the sea!
long_description: Play with ocean stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. There are many different settings, colorful objects and 16 cute animals waiting for you under the sea!

name: Listen and learn
short_description: Train your ears! Choose between animals and musical instruments. A sound is associated with each drawing. Listen to them all and then challenge yourself with quizzes. Guess which animal or musical instrument the sound you hear belongs to!
long_description: Train your ears! Choose between animals and musical instruments. A sound is associated with each drawing. Listen to them all and then challenge yourself with quizzes. Guess which animal or musical instrument the sound you hear belongs to!

name: Christmas in the Jungle
short_description: Count in the snowy jungle! Santa's hats, packages and gifts, colorful decorations and cute jungle animals are waiting for you to learn and have fun in the snow! You can practice correctly counting from 1 to 10 in 4 different settings.
long_description: Count in the snowy jungle! Santa's hats, packages and gifts, colorful decorations and cute jungle animals are waiting for you to learn and have fun in the snow! You can practice counting correctly from 1 to 10 in 4 different environments. Just drag the objects and click on the yellow button to find out if you counted correctly. Learning has never been so much fun.

name: Jungle Puzzle
short_description: Play with jungle puzzles to develop your logic and attention! Put the pieces of the puzzle in the right place and to meet many cute animals! 13 different jungle animals, 13 different environments and lots of fun are waiting for you!
long_description: Play with jungle puzzles to develop your logic and attention! Put the pieces of the puzzle in the right place and to meet many cute animals! 13 different jungle animals, 13 different environments and lots of fun are waiting for you!

name: Jungle Stickers
short_description: Play with jungle stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. Many different settings, colorful objects and 13 cute animals are waiting for you! Learning has never been so fun!
long_description: Play with jungle stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. Many different settings, colorful objects and 13 cute animals are waiting for you! Learning has never been so fun!

name: Coloring in the Farm
short_description: Color the farm animals! Match the colors correctly and have fun! Come and learn to recognize colors with the cow, horse and their friends! 8 animals and 8 settings to learn to recognize and match colors.
long_description: Color the farm animals! Match the colors correctly and have fun! Come and learn to recognize colors with the cow, horse and their friends! 8 animals and 8 settings to learn to recognize and match colors.

name: Dress up Time!
short_description: Reassemble all the carnival costumes! Choose your favorite character and start playing! Sharpen your eyes and find the right element to complete the costume and be ready to celebrate the carnival! So many funny costumes are waiting for you!
long_description: Reassemble all the carnival costumes! Choose your favorite character and start playing! Sharpen your eyes and find the right element to complete the costume and be ready to celebrate the carnival! So many funny costumes are waiting for you!

name: Spot the difference
short_description: Look carefully! Some things are different between the two pictures: find all the differences! It takes great concentration to find the differences between two seemingly identical images, but with commitment and attention you will find them all!
long_description: Look carefully! Some things are different between the two pictures: find all the differences! It takes great concentration to find the differences between two seemingly identical images, but with commitment and attention you will find them all!

name: Learn English
short_description: Listen to more than 70 English words in three different categories. Choose the category you would like or listen to them all. When you are ready, you can challenge yourself with quizzes. How many new words will you learn?
long_description: Listen to more than 70 English words in three different categories. Covering animals, food and objects, there are more than 20 words in each category to expand your English vocabulary. Choose the category you would like or listen to them all. When you are ready, you can challenge yourself with quizzes. How many new words will you learn?

name: Counting on the seabed
short_description: Count under the sea! Dolphins, pufferfish, moray eels and lobsters will guide you into the fantastic world of mathematics! In 9 different environments you can practice counting correctly from 1 to 10. Play with mathematics!
long_description: Count under the sea! Dolphins, pufferfish, moray eels and lobsters will guide you into the fantastic world of mathematics! In 9 different environments you can practice counting correctly from 1 to 10. Choose your favorite animal and count how many of them swim under the sea. Every time you play with one of them, the number of animals in the picture will change, to help you learn more and more!

name: Arthur in NY
short_description: Travelling with Arthur is the right app for traveling the world in a single tap! Traveling and learning about new cultures helps you grow and learn. With the New York games and its unusual features you can enjoy an unprecedented virtual travel experience.
long_description: Arthur and Mambo have been friends for a long time; they met in a rather bizarre way: getting their luggage mixed up in an old station! From that moment onwards, they have been inseparable. Their common love of traveling and discovering new places will ensure both they and you experience exciting adventures! In this app we will take you to the magnicent city of New York. You will discover so many unusual things and for every major attraction there will be a different game that will make you feel like real tourists.

de.name: Arthur in NY
de.short_description: Reisen mit Arthur ist die richtige App für Reisen um die Welt in einem einzigen Tipp zu erleben! Mit den New York spielen und seine Neugier kann eine Erfahrung von noch nie da gewesenen virtuellen Reisen erlebt werden.
de.long_description: Arthur und Mambo sind seid langer Zeit Freunde, sie haben sich auf einer bizarren Weise kengelernt: sie haben sich beim austauschen von Gepäck im Bahnhof kengelernt! Ab diesem Zeitpunkt waren Sie untrennbar miteinander. Ihre gemeinsame Liebe zur Reisen und Entdecken neuer Orte wird sichergestellt, dass sowohl die als auch Sie spannende Abenteuer erleben! In dieser App werden wir Sie in den wunderschönen Stadt New York rum führen. Entdecken Sie so viele ungewöhnliche Dinge und für jede größere Attraktion wird es ein anderes Spiel werden, fühlen Sie sich wie echte Touristen.

fr.name: Arthur à New York
fr.short_description: Voyager avec Arthur est la bonne application pour voyager dans le monde d'un seul coup ! Avec les jeux de New York et ses caractéristiques inhabituelles, vous pouvez créer une expérience de voyage virtuelle sans précédent.
fr.long_description: Arthur et Mambo sont amis depuis longtemps. Ils se sont rencontrés d'une manière assez bizarre : ils ont échangés leurs bagages dans une ancienne gare ! À partir de ce moment, ils ont été inséparables. Leur amour commun pour le voyage et la découverte de nouveaux endroits les animera et vous vivrez des aventures passionnantes ! Dans cette application, nous vous emmènerons dans la magnifique ville de New York. Vous découvrirez tant de choses inhabituelles et pour chaque attraction majeure, il y aura un jeu différent qui vous donner l'impression d'être de vrais touristes.
fr.tagline: Guide de New York pour les enfants

es.name: Arthur en New York
es.short_description: ¡Viajar con Arthur es la aplicación correcta para viajar por el mundo con un sólo toque! Viajar y aprender sobre nuevas culturas te ayuda a crecer y a aprender. Con los juegos de New York y sus características extraordinarias, puedes disfrutar de una experiencia de viaje virtual sin precedentes.
es.long_description: Arthur y Mambo han sido amigos por mucho tiempo; ellos se conocieron en una forma algo extraña: ¡confundiendo su equipaje en una vieja estación! Desde ese momento, ellos han sido inseparables. ¡Su amor común por el viaje y por descubrir nuevos lugares, asegurará que tanto ellos como tú, experimenten aventuras emocionantes!
es.tagline: Guía de New York para niños

it.name: Arthur a New York
it.short_description: In viaggio con Arthur è l'app giusta per girare il mondo con un tap! Viaggiare e conoscere nuove culture fa crescere e imparare. Con i giochi di New York e le sue curiosità potrete vivere un'esperienza di viaggio virtuale senza precedenti.
it.long_description: Arthur e Mambo sono amici da molto tempo, si sono conosciuti in un modo un po' bizarro: scambiandosi i bagagli in una vecchia stazione! Da allora sono inseparabili. La loro passione comune per i viaggi e le scoperte di nuovi luoghi li porterà a vivere e a farvi vivere entusiasmanti avventure!
it.tagline: Guida di New York per bambini

name: Wasteland Warriors Capture The Flag
short_description:
Introducing our brand new, 4v4 MOBA real time multiplayer game. 

Pick your sides, grab your weapons and start shooting. Capture the flag for massive points.

Use health packs to heal, hide behind structures to avoid the bullets.

Can you top the leaderboards?

Features:

- Easy and intuitive controls, for desktop and mobile (smartphones and tablets). Start fragging immediately
- Emoji support in nicknames. Use http://getemoji.com and paste into nickname field.
- Clever bot AI
- Post apocalyptic battle environment with various obstacles
- Collect health packs to survive
- Collect rocketpacks to boost your firing rate
- Competitive leaderboard for each round
long_description:
Introducing our brand new, 4v4 MOBA real time multiplayer game.

name: Monster Truck Driving
short_description:
Control your monster truck to reach the flag. 

Boost, brake and tilt your truck left/right to navigate the path.

Earn stars by completing the level in record time.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Use stars to unlock cool characters such as a cool flaming truck, Batman truck, Shark truck, Hyena truck and more.
- Panning function to plan your routes
- 20 challenging levels
- Play repeatedly to get the best high score
- Upbeat theme

Monster Truck and Dirt Bike enthusiasts will love this game.

name: 3D Bottle Shooter
short_description:
Aim and shoot glass bottles. It's so simple, yet so addictive. 

Listen to the harmonic sounds of glass shattering amidst the peaceful countryside.

Aim for 3 stars in each level.

Features:

- Over 30 challenging levels
- Serene and peaceful countryside vibe
- Simple controls for the casual user
- Beautiful, low-poly gun, countryside, trees and mountains.

short_description:
Tap and hold to attack the incoming space spores.

You only have 3 lives.

Features:

- Cool space theme
- Tap to repair your ship
- Collect powerups to boost your score
long_description:

name: Banana Running
short_description:
Play as Mr. Nanners, the funniest banana in town with a unique voice. 

Unfortunately, Mrs. Nanners is missing, and it's your job to find her in this endless runner.

Run along the city streets in your quest to find Mrs. Nanners. Slide left, right, and under obstacles while collecting Mrs Nanners dolls. 

Don't forget to collect Banana Balls, and use them to upgrade your gear.

Features:

- Funny banana theme.
- Funny banana jokes with voiceover dialogues.
- Interactive tutorial.
- Increasingly challenging difficulty as you embark on this endless runner.
- Upgrade your gear. Mr. Nanners can ride cool skateboards, Segways, hoverboards and even a rocket pack!

name: Stickman Swing
short_description:
Tap to hook. Swing and make incredible jumps.

Execute crazy acrobatic tricks like a stickman boss. Avoid obstacles at all costs.

Features:

- Simple controls and fun gameplay.
- Unlimited levels! Play forever.
- Swing like spider man stick edition.
- Funky urban theme.
- Grappling hooks and bouncers included.

name: X-Trench Run
short_description:
Avoid obstacles and take out the turrets in this space simulation game. 

As the nation's star cadet, fly your x fighter wing deep into the enemy trench, disable enemy laser gates and hunt the boss. 

It's up to you to win this space war! Stay on course, don't crash, and use your intuition! 

Features:

- Endless mode with increasing difficulty
- Highly repetitive five star gameplay. Every round is different
- Exciting boss fights. Earn your stars and stripes.
- Fast and energetic music
- Mobile and desktop friendly controls

name: Ant Smash
short_description:
These ants are everywhere!

Stop them before they reach your last line of defense.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- Fast paced action. 
- Smash ants, bugs and all other scary things.
- Random and coordinated ant movement. Test your smashing skills.
- Avoid the nasty fly at all costs.

short_description:
You wish to become the greatest muay thai fighter of all time? Start with banana trees.

Punch, kick and knee your way to score points. Just like how Buakaw does it in Thailand.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Simple tap gameplay
- Unlock advanced characters Shaolin and James
- Kickboxing or Thai inspired music for martial arts fans

name: Airplane Survival
short_description:
Drag and steer your airplane away from the enemy missiles.

Beware of enemy missiles with homing abilities. Stay clear, time your evasions and plan ahead.

Features:

- Collect powerups such as boost, ring protection and nuclear damage to extend your chances of survival
- Use the fever mode to your advantage
- Gain achievements by playing longer
- Great music and ambience
- Unlock cool aircraft with your high scores
- Innovative gameplay. Play for hours, trying to beat your previous best score

name: Kill The Spy
short_description:
Armed with your trusty pistol, it's up to you, Agent 007 to eliminate the enemy spy agents.

Tap on the correct blocks to eliminate the spy agents. Use the least amount of moves to earn more stars.

Do not hard the hostages, or else the mission will fail.

Features:

- Innovative physics and game mechanics. Aim your spy pistol to split structures into multiple pieces
- Collect treasures to increase your score
- Place your shots correctly to earn more stars
- Spy theme and  sound effects

Fans of James Bond , Men in Black and spy themed novels will love this game.

name: Fishing With Friends
short_description:
A real-time multiplayer game where you go deep water fishing with your friends.

Take aim and fire your harpoon to catch the fish. Unlock special powerups such as Rapid Fire, Exploding Net, and Ocean Vortex.

Who will emerge the winner at the end of this multiplayer fishing game?

Features:

- Extremely simple controls
- 2 minute gameplay, perfect for casual rounds
- 4 players in a room
- Unlimited rooms
- Customize your nickname and avatar
- Score combos and unlock special powerups. Open the ocean vortex to catch additional fish.

name: Stupid Zombies
short_description:
One man, one shotgun and a whole lot of zombies. You are humanity's last hope, and it's your job to keep them brainless.

Adjust your shots and angles, and you watch your bullets ricochet from wall to wall, elegantly picking off each zombie's arms and limbs.

Features:

- 4 giant stages with over 360 challenging levels
- Exciting zombie theme
- Simple and innovative ricochet based gameplay. Defeat the stupid zombies with brains and ingenuity.
- Realistic physics
- Great zombie soundtrack

name: Climb the Rocks
short_description:
Wait for the right moment to grab the next rock. 

Climb one rock at a time. Avoid unstable rocks, while keeping an eye at the prize.

Can you conquer Mount Narya?  

Features:

- Feeling strong like Rocky? Try other more challenging mountains such as Mount Kibar, Alru, Chota, Ordh and Ucca. 
- Endless gameplay
- Collect diamonds to unlock new mountain climbing characters.
- Challenging outdoor environment
- Great theme and music

- Beautiful, minimalist 3D graphics
- Endless game, perfect for high score and competitions
- Full Responsive design
- Full screen option

short_description:
21st century Santa now delivers presents via his Skybus DEC25. Help Santa navigate the skies with his cool airplane.

Collect presents, boosters and rescue kids along the way. Naughty or nice, find out yourself!

Features:


 christmas theme
 cool santa in pilot attire
 cloud obstacles
 interactive tutorial
 extremely easy and intuitive touch controls
 cool collectibles and power ups. Time to get this xmas party started!

name: Knife Dart
short_description:
Practice makes perfect. Take aim at the tree bark, and throw knives one by one.

Be careful to only throw knives at empty spots.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- Endless gameplay. Literally, practise for hours.
- Fun arcade-like theme
- Increasingly challenging levels
- Use coins to unlock cool knives in the store

Fans of dart and sports games will love this.  It's a perfect game for competitive gameplay with leaderboards.

name: Wham-O Slip 'N Slide Party
short_description:
The biggest Slip 'N Slide in Hawaii. Jump on it, and start sliding away!

Switch lanes, jump and slide, while avoiding obstacles such as road blocks and cars.

Collect coins and coconuts. Use coins to purchase cool swag from the store, such as Scuba Diving gear, rocket pack, hand paddles and swimming floats! 

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- First person 3D-like view
- Fun Hawaiian theme and music
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Extremely good looking surfer guy
- Endless gameplay
- A shop with items to unlock

Note: The desktop version uses keyboard controls. The mobile version uses easy touch/drag controls.

name: Super Jump
short_description:
You are a super hero with a cool cape. Jump over rooftoops, while collecting powerups and avoiding obstacles.

Press and hold to control your jumping power.

Time your jumps with great care, to avoid falling.

Features:

Increasingly challenging gameplay
Avoid birds in later stages
Jump on changing rooftops
Collect invincibility potions and extra lives
Fans of superhero movies such as Superman will love this game

name: Team Kaboom
short_description:
Attention soldier! Your goal is to blast enemies, and avoid getting killed. Avoid letting the enemies escape! If they escape, they'll come back faster and stronger.

Features:

- 3 different maps
- 5 cool characters. Each character holds a cool weapon. Rifles, machine guns, dynamites, knives, and oh, did we mention a rocket launcher?
- Fun pixel theme
- Intuitive controls for mobile and desktop

name: Pro Wrestling Action
short_description:
Get ready to rumble! Punch, kick, and wrestle your way through to be the last man standing.

Knock out your opponents, then throw them out of the ring!

Need to perform a spectacular feat? Climb the ropes, time your jumps and dive on the opponent.

Collect coins to upgrade your favourite wrestler in the shop.

Features:

- Simple controls to maximize fun. Start kicking and punching right away!
- Entertaining wrestling theme
- Clever and not so clever computer opponents. Just like on TV!
- Fight, collect coins, upgrade then fight again! Spend hours playing the game.
- Fill up your rage meter, and performing unstoppable RAGE attacks.

Fans of WWE, WCW, WWF and UFC will love the game.

name: Catapultz.io
short_description:

This ice cream fight is getting wild! The Oddbods can duck, run left and right, and also appear out of nowhere to attack you.

Play in cool locations such as Adrenaland,  Drown Town, Dumbest of the Dumb, and Freezerville.

- Multiple mini challenges to keep you occupied for hours

Mamma Mia! Your latest pizza creation turned into a GIANT pizza.

What's worse, it's rolling downhill.

Escape from the giant Pepperoni pizza before it crushes you!

Collect coins and perform cool acrobatic skills such as backflips and frontflips (because you can). Use the coins to unlock cool skills and new skins.

Features:

- Funny and relaxing pizza theme by the Italian countryside
- Challenging gameplay. It's easy to make a few jumps, but how far really can you travel
- Unlock more skins such as motorcycles, a funny car, a rolling lasagna and more pizza mayhem.
- Jump on to clouds too!

Compete with your friends for high scores. Leaderboard option available per request.

long_description: Math Tales Friends - Sue the Cow is a fun interactive story to read and play. Accompanied by a narrator, your child can follow a fantastic story set on a farm. The main character in this episode is Sue, a sweet and sensitive cow, who tries to achieve her dream. She'll need your help to do so! Math Tales provides a new learning gaming experience you can share with your child. Don’t forget that your involvement will make it special.

Whack as many moles as you can, within 15 seconds.

Earn extra time by hitting hard-hat moles.

Magician moles get you extra points.

Don't whack the bomb!

PS: If you're good, the boss mole will reveal itself.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Boss round
- Fun theme and fast paced
- Statistics such as percentage accuracy, hit rate and more.
- Fans of whac a mole will enjoy this. Relive your amusement park experience.

It's the adventures of Spidey. Shoot webs, grab on and swing like a spider pro. Avoid things such as sharp edges, rotating chainsaws, arrows, mace and other deadly objects.

Keep the majority of your body parts intact, and get to the finish line. Keep our beloved Spidey alive!

Features
- Interactive tutorial
- Touch, keyboard and  mouse controls
- City skyscraper theme
- Over 24 extremely challenging levels. Test your spider-man skills.
- Presence of blood and gore (can be turned off by request)

short_description:
Our pet clinic is very busy today. We've got cats, dogs, turtles, rabbits and parrots needing your medical attention.

As the pet doctor, treat each pet with the right medicine and tools. Things you will need to do include:

- removing stubborn ticks from dog fur
- giving eye drop solutions to cats
- cleaning and buffing turtle shells
- adding crutches to wounded parrots

Interested in becoming a vet? This is your chance.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Feeling stuck? Our hints will make sure you're able to heal the pets in no time
- Extremely cute looking pets
- Happy and positive sounds for inspiration

Innovative tap and drag mechanic, to form words. Form words forwards and backwards!
Interactive tutorial to learn the ropes.
Earn coins solving word puzzles.

name: Ludo With Friends
short_description:
Ludo with Friends is the modern version of the royal game of Pachisi. It's a game which was played among Indian kings and queens in ancient times. 

Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game.

No complicated login screens. Just enter your username and play against the world.

Play with your friends in a 2-player or 4-player mode.

Features:

- Chat with your friends in real-time
- Feeling lazy? Use the autoplay function
- Server side cheat detection
- Play online against friends or offline against bots or computers

Food is swinging gently from a rope. To score a slam dunk, time the Laddu's release to make it fall nicely into the basket.

How many perfect catches can you make? 

Features:

- Unlimited levels for unlimited gameplay
- Bonus points for factors such as speed, ricochets, and accuracy

name: Whiskey the spider
short_description: Ready to play with Whiskey the Spider? Enjoy this wonderful, colorful, educational game! Have fun with your child and color Whiskey, dress him up in clothes, shoes and various hats, place stickers on the background and find hidden objects in the pictures!
long_description: The games help children prepare for a big future milestone: learning how to write and draw. Writing and drawing require hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills and all of these games help develop these skills in little learners. They will learn how to tidy objects up within an image, as well as color inside the lines and free hand. They will also have the chance of dressing up Whiskey, choosing from 30 outfits (sheriff, pirate, cook, etc.) and selecting their preferred setting. With Whiskey your child has fun, creates and learns!

en.name: Arthur in NY
en.short_description: Travelling with Arthur is the right app for traveling the world in a single tap! Traveling and learning about new cultures helps you grow and learn. With the New York games and its unusual features you can enjoy an unprecedented virtual travel experience.
en.long_description: Arthur and Mambo have been friends for a long time; they met in a rather bizarre way: getting their luggage mixed up in an old station! From that moment onwards, they have been inseparable. Their common love of traveling and discovering new places will ensure both they and you experience exciting adventures! In this app we will take you to the magnicent city of New York. You will discover so many unusual things and for every major attraction there will be a different game that will make you feel like real tourists.

de.name: Arthur in NY
de.short_description: Reisen mit Arthur ist die richtige App für Reisen um die Welt in einem einzigen Tipp zu erleben! Mit den New York spielen und seine Neugier kann eine Erfahrung von noch nie da gewesenen virtuellen Reisen erlebt werden.
de.long_description: Arthur und Mambo sind seid langer Zeit Freunde, sie haben sich auf einer bizarren Weise kengelernt: sie haben sich beim austauschen von Gepäck im Bahnhof kengelernt! Ab diesem Zeitpunkt waren Sie untrennbar miteinander. Ihre gemeinsame Liebe zur Reisen und Entdecken neuer Orte wird sichergestellt, dass sowohl die als auch Sie spannende Abenteuer erleben! In dieser App werden wir Sie in den wunderschönen Stadt New York rum führen. Entdecken Sie so viele ungewöhnliche Dinge und für jede größere Attraktion wird es ein anderes Spiel werden, fühlen Sie sich wie echte Touristen.

fr.name: Arthur à New York
fr.short_description: Voyager avec Arthur est la bonne application pour voyager dans le monde d'un seul coup ! Avec les jeux de New York et ses caractéristiques inhabituelles, vous pouvez créer une expérience de voyage virtuelle sans précédent.
fr.long_description: Arthur et Mambo sont amis depuis longtemps. Ils se sont rencontrés d'une manière assez bizarre : ils ont échangés leurs bagages dans une ancienne gare ! À partir de ce moment, ils ont été inséparables. Leur amour commun pour le voyage et la découverte de nouveaux endroits les animera et vous vivrez des aventures passionnantes ! Dans cette application, nous vous emmènerons dans la magnifique ville de New York. Vous découvrirez tant de choses inhabituelles et pour chaque attraction majeure, il y aura un jeu différent qui vous donner l'impression d'être de vrais touristes.
fr.tagline: Guide de New York pour les enfants

es.name: Arthur en New York
es.short_description: ¡Viajar con Arthur es la aplicación correcta para viajar por el mundo con un sólo toque! Viajar y aprender sobre nuevas culturas te ayuda a crecer y a aprender. Con los juegos de New York y sus características extraordinarias, puedes disfrutar de una experiencia de viaje virtual sin precedentes.
es.long_description: Arthur y Mambo han sido amigos por mucho tiempo; ellos se conocieron en una forma algo extraña: ¡confundiendo su equipaje en una vieja estación! Desde ese momento, ellos han sido inseparables. ¡Su amor común por el viaje y por descubrir nuevos lugares, asegurará que tanto ellos como tú, experimenten aventuras emocionantes!
es.tagline: Guía de New York para niños

it.name: Arthur a New York
it.short_description: In viaggio con Arthur è l'app giusta per girare il mondo con un tap! Viaggiare e conoscere nuove culture fa crescere e imparare. Con i giochi di New York e le sue curiosità potrete vivere un'esperienza di viaggio virtuale senza precedenti.
it.long_description: Arthur e Mambo sono amici da molto tempo, si sono conosciuti in un modo un po' bizarro: scambiandosi i bagagli in una vecchia stazione! Da allora sono inseparabili. La loro passione comune per i viaggi e le scoperte di nuovi luoghi li porterà a vivere e a farvi vivere entusiasmanti avventure!
it.tagline: Guida di New York per bambini

Vergessen Sie nicht, dass durch Ihr Mitwirken alles noch interessanter wird.

fr.name: Math Tales Friend

Avec ses animations interactives drôles, graphiques colorées et ses mini-jeux amusants, cette application est tout simplement unique. Qui a dit que l’apprentissage doit être ennuyeux ?
fr.long_description: Math Tales Friends - Lucette la vache est une histoire intéractive et amusante pour apprendre à lire et pour jouer. Accompagné d'un narrateur, votre enfant peut suivre une histoire fantastique dans une ferme. Le personnage principal de cet épisode est Lucette, une vache douce et sensible, qui essaie de réaliser son rêve. Elle aura besoin de ton aide pour le faire ! Math Tales fournit une nouvelle expérience d'apprentissage par le jeu que vous pouvez partager avec votre enfant. N'oubliez pas que c'est votre implication qui la rendra particulière.

es.name: Math Tales Friend
es.short_description:
Math Tales Friends - Conchita la Vaca es una historia maravillosa para niños entre 3 y 5 años. Con sus divertidas animaciones interactivas, gráficos coloridos y divertidos mini-juegos, esta aplicación es sencillamente única.
 ¿Quién ha dicho que para aprender haya que aburrirse?
es.long_description:
Math Tales Friends - Conchita la Vaca es una divertida historia interactiva para leer y jugar.
 Acompañado por un narrador, su hijo puede seguir una fantástica historia en una granja. El personaje principal de este episodio es Conchita, una vaca dulce y sensible, que trata de lograr su sueño. ¡Necesitará su ayuda para hacerlo!

it.name: Math Tales Friend
it.short_description:
Math Tales Friends - Sisina la Mucca è una splendida storia per bambini di età compresa tra 3 e 5 anni. Con le sue spassose animazioni interattive, la sua coloratissima grafica e i suoi divertenti mini-giochi questa app è semplicemente unica.
 Chi l'ha detto che per imparare ci si debba annoiare?
it.long_description:
Math Tales Friends - Sisina la Mucca è un divertente racconto interattivo da leggere e giocare.
 Accompagnato da una voce narrante, il bambino potrà seguire una fantastica storia ambientata nella fattoria. Protagonista di questo episodio è Sisina, la dolce e sensibile mucca, che proverà a realizzare il suo sogno. Avrà bisogno anche del vostro aiuto per raggiungere il suo scopo.

name: Math Tales The Farm
short_description: Help the farmer to find his animals and you will become the master of mathematics! You will learn about different colors, shapes and the numbers with a nursery rhyme and many fun games. Who said that learning should be boring?
long_description: Math Tales The Farm is a tale set on the farm with mathematical and logic mini-games for kids between 3 and 5 years old.  It is divided in 6 chapter, each one is connected to an animal. Each chapter presents 3 mini-games and it finish with the finding of a farm animal.  Accompanied by a narrative voice, your child will be transported into a fantastic world where he will learn about colors and numbers and will have to use logic in order to find all the animals!

en.name: Math Tales The Farm
en.short_description: Help the farmer to find his animals and you will become the master of mathematics! You will learn about different colors, shapes and the numbers with a nursery rhyme and many fun games. Who said that learning should be boring?

en.tagline: Nursery rhymes and math games for kids

de.name: Math Tales Der Bauernhof
de.short_description: Helfe dem Bauern seine Tiere zu finden und werde ein Mathematik-Meister! Durch einen Kinderreim und viele lustige Spiele, kann man verschiedene Farben, Formen und Zahlen lernen. Wer sagte, dass das Lernen langweilig werden sollte?
de.long_description: Math Tales Der Bauernhof spielt sich auf einem Bauernhof ab und beinhaltet mathematische und logische Mini-Spiele für Kinder im Alter zwischen 3 und 5 Jahren. Math Tales Der Bauernhof ist in 6 Kapitel aufgeteilt und jeder einzelne bezieht sich auf ein Tier. Jeder Kapitel hat drei Mini-Spiele, welche mit dem Finden des Tieres enden. Die Stimme des Erzählers begleitet Ihr Kind in eine fantastische Welt, in der es Farben und Zahlen lernt und die Logik anwenden muss, um alle Tiere zu finden!

fr.name: Math Tales La Ferme
fr.short_description: Aide le fermier à retrouver ses animaux et tu deviendras un champion des maths ! Tu apprendras différentes couleurs, formes et numéros à l'aide de comptines et de nombreux jeux amusants. Qui a dit que l’apprentissage doit être ennuyeux ?
fr.long_description: Math Tales La Ferme est un conte situé à la ferme avec des mini-jeux mathématiques et logiques pour les enfants âgés de 3 à 5 ans. La comptine Math Tales La Ferme est divisée en six chapitres, dont chacun est relié à un animal. Chaque chapitre présente trois mini-jeux et à sa fin, on retrouve un animal égaré de la ferme. Accompagné par une voix narrative, votre enfant sera transporté dans un monde fantastique où il va apprendre les couleurs et les numéros et devra utiliser la logique afin de trouver tous les animaux !

es.name: Math Tales La Granja
es.short_description: Ayuda al granjero a encontrar los animales de su granja y llegarás a ser el rey de las matemáticas! Aprenderás colores, formas y números con la cantinela infantil y con muchos juegos divertidos! Las matemáticas nunca han sido tan divertidas!
es.long_description:
Math Tales La Granja es una historia dividida en seis capítulos, cada uno de los cuales está asociado con un tema educativo y con un animal diferentes. Cada capítulo contene 3 juegos y finaliza con el descubrimiento del animal protagonista.
 Math Tales La Granja es una historia en verso interactiva ambientada en una granja en que la narración se alterna con juegos pensados para niños de 3 a 5 años.
 Acompañado por un narrador, el niño va a viajar con la ayuda de la cantinela infantil la cual lo llevará a encontrar los animales de la granja.
 Para ello tendrá que aprender a colorear, contar y usar la lógica para encontrarlos a todos.

it.name: Math Tales La Fattoria
it.short_description: Aiuta il fattore a trovare gli animali della fattoria e diventerai il re della matematica! Imparerai colori, forme e numeri con una filastrocca e con tanti giochi divertenti! La matematica non è mai stata così divertente!
it.long_description:
Math Tales – La Fattoria é un racconto in rima interattivo ambientato nella fattoria nel quale la narrazione si alterna a dei mini-giochi di matematica e logica pensati per bambini dai 3 ai 5 anni. Il racconto è suddiviso in 6 capitoli, ad ognuno dei quali é associato un animale ed un diverso argomento didattico. Ogni capitolo presenta al suo interno 3 mini giochi e termina con il ritrovamento dell'animale protagonista.
 Accompagnato da una voce narrante, il bambino percorrerà tutta la filastrocca che lo porterà a trovare gli animali della fattoria! Per fare questo dovrà imparare a colorare, contare e usare la logica per trovarli tutti!

name: Math Tales The Ocean
short_description: Every year the Oceanics are held in the ocean: fantastic Olympic Games... underwater! They need your help getting everything ready for the competitions! Follow the rhyme and help count, add and reorder! Who said that learning should be boring?
long_description: Children practice counting and counting down, drawing and learning complex geometric shapes and logical associations, all while having tons of fun! Accompanied by a narrator, the rhymes will catapult children into a fantastic world where ocean animals are organizing Olympic Games and each of them needs help to complete a task: writing numbers on sports vests, placing obstacles on tracks or counting down before the start of a race.

en.name: Math Tales The Ocean
en.short_description: Every year the Oceanics are held in the ocean: fantastic Olympic Games... underwater! They need your help getting everything ready for the competitions! Follow the rhyme and help count, add and reorder! Who said that learning should be boring?
en.long_description: Children practice counting and counting down, drawing and learning complex geometric shapes and logical associations, all while having tons of fun! de.name: Math Tales The Ocean
de.short_description: Jedes Jahr werden die Ozeanics im Ozean abgehalten: Fantastische Olympische Spiele … unter Wasser! Sie brauchen deine Hilfe, um alles für die Konkurrenten vorzubereiten! Folge dem Rhythmus und helfe beim Zählen, Addieren und Ordnen! langweilig werden sollte?
de.long_description: Kinder üben das Zählen und Abzählen, Zeichnen und das Erlernen komplexer geometrischer Formen und logischer Assoziationen und werden dabei jede Menge Spaß haben! Begleitet von einem Erzähler werden die Reime Kinder in eine fantastische Welt katapultieren, in der Ozeantiere Olympische Spiele organisieren und jeder von ihnen Hilfe braucht, um eine Aufgabe zu erfüllen: das Schreiben von Nummern auf Sportwesten, das Platzieren von Hindernissen auf den Bahnen oder den Countdown vor dem Beginn eines Rennen herunterzählen.

fr.name: Math Tales The Ocean
fr.short_description: Chaque année, les Océaniques se tiennent dans l'océan : les fantastiques Jeux Olympiques ... sous l'eau ! Ils ont besoin de ton aide pour tout préparer pour les compétitions ! Suis la rime et aide à compter, à ajouter et à réorganiser ! Qui a dit que l’apprentissage doit être ennuyeux ?
fr.long_description: Les enfants pratiquent le comptage et le compte à rebours, dessinent et apprennent des formes géométriques et des associations logiques, tout en s'amusant énormément ! Accompagné par un narrateur, les rimes catapulteront les enfants dans un monde fantastique où les animaux de l'océan ont organisés les jeux olympiques et chacun d'entre eux a besoin d'aider pour accomplir une tâche : écrire les numéros sur les maillots, placer des obstacles sur les pistes ou compter avant le début d'une course.

es.name: Math Tales - El Océano
es.short_description:
Cada año los Océanicos están retenidos en el océano: Juegos Olímpicos fantásticos… ¡Debajo del agua! Ellos necesitan tu ayuda para tener todo listo para las competencias! ¡Sigue la rima y ayuda a contar, agregar y reordenar!
 ¿Quién ha dicho que para aprender haya que aburrirse?
es.long_description:
Los niños practican contando y contando hacia atrás, dibujando y aprendiendo la complexión de las figuras geométricas y asociaciones lógicas, ¡todo esto teniendo toneladas de diversión! 
 Acompañado por un narrado, las rimas adentrarán a los niños a un mundo fantástico donde los animales del océano estan organizando los Juegos Olímpicos y cada uno de ellos necesita ayuda para completar una tarea: escribir números en chalecos deportivos, colocando obstáculos en la pista o contando antes del inicio de una carrera.

it.name: Math Tales - L'Oceano
it.short_description:
Nell'oceano, come ogni anno, si celebrano le Oceaniadi, fantastici giochi olimpici... subacquei! C'è bisogno del tuo aiuto per organizzare tutto per le competizioni! Segui la filastrocca e aiuta a contare, sommare e riordinare!
 Chi l'ha detto che per imparare ci si debba annoiare?
it.long_description:
Il bambino potrà contare, disegnare, imparare forme geometriche complesse, cimentarsi in associazioni logiche e nel conto alla rovescia per un divertimento senza precedenti!
 Accompagnato da una voce narrante, il bambino sarà catapultato con delle filastrocche in un fantastico mondo dove gli animali dell'oceano stanno organizzando dei divertentissimi giochi olimpici ed ognuno di loro ha bisogno di aiuto per completare un’attività, come scrivere i numeri sulle pettorine, sistemare gli ostacoli sulla pista o fare il conto alla rovescia prima della gara.

name: Hexaparty
short_description: Are you looking for a stimulating game? With Hexaparty colours, you relax and have fun! With Hexaparty you can create fantastic drawings without having to be an artist! Colouring in has never been this easy! Just relax and have fun!
long_description: Hexaparty is the first game of Hexel Art for kids. With this beautiful app you can create fantastic drawings without having to be an artist! The hexels will guide you towards perfection - every design will be a masterpiece! Colouring is a relaxing activity that frees the mind.

Suchst ein anregendes Spiel? Mit Hexaparty-Farben entspannst du dich und hast Spaß!

fr.short_description:
Vous cherchez un jeu stimulant ? Avec les couleurs Hexaparty, vous vous détendez et vous vous amusez !
 Créez des designs fantastiques sans être un artiste!

Les hexagones vous guideront vers la perfection - chaque design sera un chef-d'œuvre ! La coloration est une activité relaxante qui libère l'esprit.

es.short_description:
¿Estás buscando un juego estimulante? ¡Con los colores de Hexaparty, te relajas y te diviertes!
 ¡Con esta hermosa aplicación puedes crear dibujos fantásticos sin tener que ser un artista!
 ¡Colorear nunca ha sido tan fácil! ¡Solo relájate y diviértete!

Los hexeles te guiarán hacia la perfección, ¡cada diseño será una obra maestra! Colorear es una actividad relajante que libera la mente.
es.tagline: La primera aplicación de hexel art para niños.

it.name: Hexaparty
it.short_description:
Cerchi un gioco stimolante? Con Hexaparty colori, ti rilassi e ti diverti!
 Con Hexeparty puoi creare fantastici disegni senza dover essere un artista!
 Colorare non è mai stato così facile! Solo relax e divertimento!
it.long_description: Hexaparty è il primo gioco di Hexel Art per ragazzi. Con questa bellissima app puoi creare dei fantastici disegni senza dover essere un artista! Saranno gli hexel a guidarti verso la perfezione, ogni disegno sarà un capolavoro! Colorare è un'attività rilassante che libera la mente.
it.tagline: La prima app di hexel art per bambini

name: Arthur in London
short_description: Travelling with Arthur is the right app for traveling the world in a single tap! Traveling and learning about new cultures helps you grow and learn. With the London games and its unusual features you can enjoy an unprecedented virtual travel experience.
long_description: Arthur and Mambo have been friends for a long time; they met in a rather bizarre way: getting their luggage mixed up in an old station! From that moment onwards, they have been inseparable. Their common love of traveling and discovering new places will ensure both they and you experience exciting adventures! In this app we will take you to the magnicent city of London. You will discover so many unusual things and for every major attraction there will be a different game that will make you feel like real tourists.

en.name: Whiskey the spider
en.short_description:
Ready to play with Whiskey the Spider? Enjoy this wonderful, colorful, educational game!
 Have fun with your child and color Whiskey, dress him up in clothes, shoes and various hats, place stickers on the background and find hidden objects in the pictures!
en.long_description: The games help children prepare for a big future milestone: learning how to write and draw. Writing and drawing require hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills and all of these games help develop these skills in little learners. They will learn how to tidy objects up within an image, as well as color inside the lines and free hand. They will also have the chance of dressing up Whiskey, choosing from 30 outfits (sheriff, pirate, cook, etc.) and selecting their preferred setting. With Whiskey your child has fun, creates and learns!

de.name: Whiskey die Spinne
de.short_description:
Mit Whiskey hat Euer Kind Spaß, ist schöpferisch tätig und lernt!
 Habt Spaß mit Eurem Kind, wenn Ihr Whiskey bemalt, ihm Kleidung, Schuhe und diverse Hüte anzieht, Sticker auf dem Hintergrund platziert und versteckte Objekte in den Bildern findet!
de.long_description: Die Spiele helfen Kindern, sich auf einen großen zukünftigen Meilenstein vorzubereiten: Schreiben und Zeichnen zu lernen. Schreiben und Zeichnen erfordern Hand-Auge-Koordination und Feinmotorik, und all diese Spiele helfen, diese Fähigkeiten bei kleinen Lernenden zu entwickeln. Sie lernen, wie sie Objekte in einem Bild aufräumen sowie die Linien mit freier Hand einzufärben. Sie haben auch die Möglichkeit Whiskey zu verkleiden, aus 30 Outfits (Sheriff, Pirat, Koch usw.) auszuwählen und ihre bevorzugte Einstellung zu bestimmen. Mit Whiskey hat dein Kind Spaß, lernt und kreirt gleichzeitig!
de.tagline: Bist Du bereit, mit Whiskey zu spielen?

fr.name: Whiskey l'araignée
fr.short_description:
Avec Whiskey, votre enfant s'amusera, créera et apprendra !
 Amusez-vous avec votre enfant en coloriant Whiskey, en l'habillant avec des vêtements, des chaussures et des chapeaux variés, en plaçant les auto-collants en arrière-plan et en trouvant les objets cachés dans les images !
fr.long_description: Les jeux aident les enfants à se préparer à une étape importante de leur vie : apprendre à écrire et à dessiner. L'écriture et le dessin exigent une coordination œil-main et une motricité fine, et tous ces jeux aident à développer ces habiletés chez les petits apprenants. Ils apprendront à ranger les objets à l'intérieur d'une image ainsi que la couleur à l'intérieur des lignes et la main libre. Ils auront également la possibilité de déguiser Whiskey, de choisir parmi 30 tenues (shérif, pirate, cuisinier, etc.) et de choisir leur décor préféré. Avec Whiskey, votre enfant s'amuse, crée et apprend !

es.name: Whiskey la araña
es.short_description:
¡Con Whiskey su hijo se divierte, crea y aprende!
 Diviértase con su hijo, coloree a Whiskey, póngale ropa, zapatos y varios sombreros, colocando pegatinas en el fondo y encontrando objetos ocultos en las imágenes.
es.long_description: A travès de los juegos propuestos , el niño se podrà acercar al pregrafismo en modo fàcil y divertente , aprendiendo a ordenar los objetos al interno de una imagen, colorando los espacios estabilidos o tambièn con la mano libre. Tendrà tambièn la posibilidad de personalizar Whiskey con màs de 30 outfit (alguacil,pirata, cocinero, etc..) escogiendo la ambientaciòn que mas te gusta. Con una realidad aumentada podràs vivir una extraordinaria experiencia con un maravilloso juego interactivo. Con Whiskey la araña tu niño se divierte, crea y aprende!

it.name: Whiskey il ragnetto
it.short_description:
Finalmente Whiskey il ragnetto è pronto per giocare con te! Ecco l'app ufficiale del famoso personaggio del video di Coccole Sonore!
 Divertiti con il tuo bambino a colorare il personaggio, vestirlo con abiti, scarpe e cappelli differenti, attaccare gli stickers sullo sfondo e cercare gli oggetti nascosti nelle immagini!
it.long_description:
Attraverso i giochi proposti, il bambino potrà approcciarsi al pregrafismo in modo semplice e divertente, imparare a riordinare gli oggetti all’interno di un’immagine, colorare in spazi prestabiliti oppure a mano libera. Avrà inoltre la possibilità di personalizzare Whiskey con oltre 30 outfit (sceriffo, pirata, cuoco, etc.) scegliendo l’ambientazione che preferisce. Con la realtà aumentata potrà vivere la straordinaria esperienza di un meraviglioso gioco interattivo.
 
 Con Whiskey il ragnetto il tuo bambino si diverte, crea e impara!

name: Doctor Justabout
short_description: Doctor Justabout is an extraordinary journey of discovery through the human body, designed for children. A fun and educational app that teaches how the systems and organs of the body work, with lots of interesting facts and fun animations.
long_description: You will get to know the eccentric Doctor Justabout with whom you will enjoy discovering his patients' ""strange illnesses"", helping them to recover through fun games. Start discovering the human body as a machine, you can:  - EXPLORE the various systems, to understand how they work and discover the secrets of our body through lively animations, after choosing your favorite character from Sarah, Anna, Mark and John  - ACCESS either the '' X rays"" section to discover the skeletal and muscular system by moving around a magnifying glass or the ''Advice'' section that is rich in information on hygiene, nutrition and physical activity  - PLAY with Doctor Justabout challenge yourself with fun quizzes. At his clinic, discover the bizarre illnesses of his patients whom you will have to cure by literally entering their systems.

en.name: Doctor Justabout
en.short_description: Doctor Justabout is an extraordinary journey of discovery through the human body, designed for children. A fun and educational app that teaches how the systems and organs of the body work, with lots of interesting facts and fun animations.
en.long_description:
You will get to know the eccentric Doctor Justabout with whom you will enjoy discovering his patients' "strange illnesses", helping them to recover through fun games. Start discovering the human body as a machine, you can: 
 - EXPLORE the various systems, to understand how they work and discover the secrets of our body through lively animations, after choosing your favorite character from Sarah, Anna, Mark and John 
 - ACCESS either the '' X rays" section to discover the skeletal and muscular system by moving around a magnifying glass or the ''Advice'' section that is rich in information on hygiene, nutrition and physical activity 
 - PLAY with Doctor Justabout challenge yourself with fun quizzes. At his clinic, discover the bizarre illnesses of his patients whom you will have to cure by literally entering their systems.

de.name: Doctor Justabout
de.short_description: Doktor Justabout nimmt Kinder und junge Erwachsene mit auf eine Reise durch den menschlichen Körper. Eine unterhaltsame und edukative App, die die Funktionsweise unserer Organe durch interessante und unterhaltsame Animationen erklärt.
de.long_description:
Cosmolander ist eine Reise durch das Sonnensystem, ein fantastisches Abenteuer für Kinder und junge Erwachsene zu lernen und dabei Spaß haben. Versuche dich in den Weltraum katapultieren, um zu erfahren, über die Wunder der Planeten und der Sonne, wie sie sich bewegen und sammle neugierige Fakten und Entdeckungen. Die benutzerfreundliche Oberfläche und die Stimme des Erzählers führt Dich in den Raum. In diesem intergalaktischen Abenteuer, und Du wirst in der Lage sein: 
 - die einzelnen Planeten erforschen, um mehr über sie zu erfahren und ihre Eigenschaften, dank 4 detaillierte Abschnitte (Struktur, Satelliten, kuriose Tatsachen und Reisen und Entdeckungen). 
 - die Durchführung der verschiedenen Missionen für jeden Planeten mit ihrem Raumschiff. 
 - Neugierige Fakten und Informationen über den Planeten durch Quizfragen entdecken, die Dir eine geheime Mission auf dem Planeten Ihrer Wahl ermöglichen.

fr.name: Doctor Justabout
fr.short_description: Dr. Justabout est un voyage de découverte extraordinaire à travers le corps humain, conçu pour les enfants. Une application amusante et éducative qui enseigne comment les systèmes et les organes du corps fonctionnent avec beaucoup d’animation.
fr.long_description:
Vous connaîtrez l’excentrique Dr Justabout avec qui vous découvrirez les maladies « étranges » des patients. Aussi, vous l’aiderez à les guérir par le bias de jeux amusants. Pour découvrir le corps humain, vous pouvez : 
 - EXPLORER les différents systèmes afin de comprendre leur fonctionnement et pour découvrir les secrets de notre corps à travers des animations dynamiques. Tout cela après avoir choisi votre personnage préféré : Sara, Anna, Marco et Jean. 
 - ACCEDER à la section « radiographies » pour découvrir le squelette et le système musculaire en déplaçant une loupe ; ou accéder à la section « conseils » qui est riche en information concernant l’hygiène, la nutrition et l’activité physique. 
 - JOUER avec le Dr Justabout pour relever le défi avec des questionnaires et découvrir les maladies bizarres de ses patients dans sa clinique ; guérissez-les en entrant littéralement à l’intérieur de leur système.

es.name: Doctor Justabout
es.short_description:
El Doctor Justabout y el cuerpo humano es un extraordinario viaje para descubrir el cuerpo humano diseñado para niños y jóvenes.
 Una app divertida y educativa que enseña el funcionamiento de los aparatos y órganos con un montón de curiosidades y divertidas animaciones.
es.long_description:
Conocerás al extravagante Dr. Justabout, con quien te divertirás descubriendo las extrañas enfermedades de sus pacientes y los ayudarás a curarse a través de divertidísimos juegos. 
 Empieza a jugar para descubrir la máquina del cuerpo humano y podrás:
  - EXPLORAR los diferentes aparatos, comprender cómo funcionan y descubrir los secretos de nuestro organismo a través de entretenidas animaciones, después de elegir a tu personaje favorito entre Sara, Ana, Marcos y Juan
  - ACCEDER a la sección Rayos X para descubrir el sistema esquelético y muscular colocando una lente de aumento, o a la sección Consejos, para obtener información sobre la higiene, la alimentación y la actividad física
  - JUGAR con el Dr. Justabout para ponerte a prueba con divertidos cuestionarios y descubrir las extrañas enfermedades de los pacientes de su ambulatorio, a los que tendrás que curar entrando, literalmente, en sus aparatos.

it.name: Doctor Justabout
it.short_description:
Il Dottor Perlopiù e Il corpo umano è uno straordinario viaggio alla scoperta del corpo umano pensato per bambini e ragazzi.
 Un'app divertente ed educativa che insegna il funzionamento di apparati ed organi con tante curiosità e divertenti animazioni.
it.long_description:
Conoscerai lo stravagante Dr. Perlopiù con il quale ti divertirai a scoprire le “strane malattie” dei suoi pazienti e li aiuterai a guarirli attraverso dei divertentissimi giochi. 
 Inizia a giocare per scoprire la macchina del corpo umano e potrai:
 - ESPLORARE i diversi apparati, capire come funzionano e scoprire i segreti del nostro organismo attraverso vivaci animazioni, dopo aver scelto il tuo personaggio preferito tra Sara, Anna, Marco e Gianni 
 - ACCEDERE alla sezione ''Raggi x'' per scoprire il sistema scheletrico e muscolare attraverso lo spostamento di una lente di ingrandimento o alla sezione ''Consigli'' per arricchirti di informazioni utili su igiene, alimentazione e attività fisica
 - GIOCARE con il Dr. Perlopiù per sfidare te stesso con divertenti quiz e scoprire le bizzarre malattie dei suoi pazienti all'interno del suo ambulatorio che dovrai guarire entrando letteralmente all'interno degli apparati.

name: Street Music Academy
short_description: Who said that to learn music you need a musical instrument? With Street Music Academy every object is perfect for unleashing the rocker in you! Bottles, boxes, shoe laces, skateboards, glass bottles and even your belly will be your instruments.
long_description: Street Music Academy is the right tool for igniting your passion for music! Immerse yourself in a real-life game, where street objects come alive with rhythm and musicality. Achieve perfection! Listen and reproduce the thumping musical sequences that challenge your sense of rhythm. Getting 3 stars and becoming a rock star is your only goal! Not just a game for children. Ideal for learning to recognize and reproduce notes, rhythms and melodies, it stimulates coordination and memory. The practical and intuitive approach of "Street Music Academy" will help you explore a new world of entertainment and music.

en.name: Street Music Academy
en.short_description: Who said that to learn music you need a musical instrument? With Street Music Academy every object is perfect for unleashing the rocker in you! Bottles, boxes, shoe laces, skateboards, glass bottles and even your belly will be your instruments.
en.long_description: Street Music Academy is the right tool for igniting your passion for music! Immerse yourself in a real-life game, where street objects come alive with rhythm and musicality. Achieve perfection! Listen and reproduce the thumping musical sequences that challenge your sense of rhythm. Getting 3 stars and becoming a rock star is your only goal! Not just a game for children. Ideal for learning to recognize and reproduce notes, rhythms and melodies, it stimulates coordination and memory. The practical and intuitive approach of "Street Music Academy" will help you explore a new world of entertainment and music.

de.name: Street Music Academy
de.short_description: "Wer hat gesagt, dass für die Musik zu lernen, brauchst Du ein Musikinstrument? Mit Street Music Academy jedes Objekt ist perfekt für die Entfesselung der Rocker in dir! Schnürsenkel, Skateboards, Glasflaschen und sogar ihr Bauch wird ihre Instrumente."
de.long_description: Street Music Academy ist das perfekte Instrument für ihre Leidenschaft für die Musik entzündet! Tauchen Sie ein in eine Real-life Spiel, wo die Straße Objekte lebendig mit Rhythmus und Musikalität. Perfektion erreichen! Hören und Sehe dich die schnelle musikalische Sequenzen, die Herausforderung, ihren Sinn für Rhythmus. Das 3 Sterne und ein Rock Star ist Ihr Ziel! Ideal für das Lernen zu erkennen und wiederzugeben, Notizen, Rhythmen und Melodien, es regt die Koordinierung und Speicher. Die praktischen und intuitiven Ansatz der "Street Music Academy" wird Ihnen helfen, entdecken Sie eine neue Welt der Unterhaltung und Musik.

fr.name: Street Music Academy
fr.short_description: Qui a dit que pour apprendre la musique, vous avez besoin d’un instrument de musique ? Avec Street Music Academy chaque objet est parfait pour déclencher le rocker en vous ! Des lacets, des bouteilles en verre et même votre ventre seront vos instruments.
fr.long_description: Street Music Academy est l’instrument idéal pour allumer votre passion pour la musique ! Plongez-vous dans un jeu de la vie réelle, où les objets de la rue s’animent avec le rythme et la musicalité. Atteignez la perfection ! Écoutez et jouez les séquences musicales rapides qui défient votre sens du rythme. Obtenir 3 étoiles et devenir une vedette du rock est votre seul but ! Non seulement un jeu pour les enfants. Idéal pour apprendre à reconnaître et lire les notes, les rythmes et les mélodies, en stimulant la coordination et la mémoire. L’approche pratique et intuitive de Street Music Academy vous aidera à explorer un nouveau monde de divertissement et de musique.

es.name: Street Music Academy
es.short_description:
¿Quién ha dicho que para aprender música hace falta un instrumento musical? Con Street Music Academy cada objeto es perfecto para ¡liberar al roquero que hay en ti!
 Cordones de zapatos, monopatines e incluso tu barriga serán tus instrumentos.
es.long_description:
¡Street Music Academy es la herramienta adecuada para encender tu pasión por la música! Sumérgete en un juego realista, en el que los objetos de la calle se llenan de ritmo y musicalidad.
 ¡Alcanza la perfección!
 Escucha y reproduce las rápidas secuencias musicales que desafían tu sentido del ritmo. ¡Obtener las trés estrellas y convertirte en estrella del rock serán tu único objetivo!
 No es sólo un juego de niños

it.name: Street Music Academy
it.short_description:
Chi l'ha detto che per imparare la musica serve uno strumento musicale? Con Street Music Academy ogni oggetto è perfetto per scatenare il rocker che è in te!
 Lacci di scarpe, skateboard e persino la tua pancia saranno i tuoi strumenti.
it.long_description:
Street Music Academy è il giusto strumento per accendere la tua passione per la musica! Immergiti in un gioco di vita reale, dove gli oggetti di strada si animano con ritmo e musicalità.
 Raggiungi la perfezione!
 Ascolta e riproduci le incalzanti sequenze musicali che sfidano il tuo senso del ritmo. Ottenere le 3 stelle e diventare la star del rock saranno il tuo unico obiettivo!
 Non solo un gioco per bambini

name: Cosmolander
short_description: Cosmolander offers the opportunity to take an unprecedented interstellar educational trip. It is aimed at children ages 6 and over who love space and astronomy, and is also perfect for those who have never set foot outside our planet!
long_description:
"Cosmolander" is a journey through the solar system, a fantastic adventure for children and young adults in which they can learn whilst having fun. Try catapulting into space to learn about the wonders of the planets and the sun, see how they move and enrich your knowledge with interesting facts and discoveries. Its friendly interface and the narrator's voice will guide you through space. Begin this intergalactic educational journey and you will be able to: 
- EXPLORE the individual planets to learn more about them and study their characteristics, all thanks to 4 detailed sections (structure, satellites, interesting facts and journeys and discoveries). 
- PLAY carrying out of the various Missions for each planet with your spaceship. 
- DISCOVER interesting facts and information about the planets through quizzes that allow you to undertake a secret mission on the planet of your choice.

en.name: Cosmolander
en.short_description: Cosmolander offers the opportunity to take an unprecedented interstellar educational trip. It is aimed at children ages 6 and over who love space and astronomy, and is also perfect for those who have never set foot outside our planet!
en.long_description:
"Cosmolander" is a journey through the solar system, a fantastic adventure for children and young adults in which they can learn whilst having fun. Try catapulting into space to learn about the wonders of the planets and the sun, see how they move and enrich your knowledge with interesting facts and discoveries. Its friendly interface and the narrator's voice will guide you through space. Begin this intergalactic educational journey and you will be able to: 
 - EXPLORE the individual planets to learn more about them and study their characteristics, all thanks to 4 detailed sections (structure, satellites, interesting facts and journeys and discoveries). 
 - PLAY carrying out of the various Missions for each planet with your spaceship. 
 - DISCOVER interesting facts and information about the planets through quizzes that allow you to undertake a secret mission on the planet of your choice.

de.name: Cosmolander
de.short_description: Cosmolander - Missionen im Sonnensystem richtet sich an Kinder im Alter von 6 die lieben dem Raum und Astronomie, und ist ideal für diejenigen, die noch nie einen Fuß auf unseren Planeten gesetzt haben!
de.long_description:
Cosmolander ist eine Reise durch das Sonnensystem, ein fantastisches Abenteuer für Kinder und junge Erwachsene zu lernen und dabei Spaß haben. Versuche dich in den Weltraum katapultieren, um zu erfahren, über die Wunder der Planeten und der Sonne, wie sie sich bewegen und sammle neugierige Fakten und Entdeckungen. Die benutzerfreundliche Oberfläche und die Stimme des Erzählers führt Dich in den Raum. In diesem intergalaktischen Abenteuer, und Du wirst in der Lage sein: 
 - die einzelnen Planeten erforschen, um mehr über sie zu erfahren und ihre Eigenschaften, dank 4 detaillierte Abschnitte (Struktur, Satelliten, kuriose Tatsachen und Reisen und Entdeckungen). 
 - die Durchführung der verschiedenen Missionen für jeden Planeten mit ihrem Raumschiff. 
 - Neugierige Fakten und Informationen über den Planeten durch Quizfragen entdecken, die Dir eine geheime Mission auf dem Planeten Ihrer Wahl ermöglichen.

fr.name: Cosmolander
fr.short_description: Cosmolander - Missions dans le système solaire : s’adresse aux enfants âgés de 6 ans et plus aimant l’espace et l’astronomie, et est également parfait pour ceux qui n’ont jamais mis les pieds hors de notre planète !
fr.long_description:
Cosmolander est un voyage à travers le système solaire, une aventure fantastique pour que les enfants et les jeunes adultes apprennent en s’amusant. Essayez de vous projeter dans l’espace pour apprendre des merveilles des planètes et du soleil et de leur déplacement. Enrichissez-vous des curiosités et de découvertes. Une interface amicale et la voix du narrateur vous guiderons dans l’espace. Si vous commencez ce voyage éducatif intergalactique vous pourrez: 
 - EXPLORER les planètes individuellement, ainsi en savoir plus à leur sujet, vous étudierez leurs caractéristiques, tout cela grâce à 4 sections détaillées (structure, satellites, curiosités et voyages et découvertes). 
 - JOUER en accomplissant de diverses missions (une pour chaque planète) avec votre vaisseau spatial. 
 - DÉCOUVRIR des curiosités et des informations sur les planètes par le bias des questionnaires qui vous permettront d’entreprendre une mission secrète sur la planète de votre choix.

es.name: Cosmolander
es.short_description: Cosmolander ofrece la posibilidad de realizar un viaje educativo interestelar sin precedentes y está dirigida a niños de 6 años en adelante a los que les guste el espacio y la astronomía, ¡ideal también para aquellos que nunca han puesto un pie fuera de nuestro planeta!
es.long_description:
Cosmolander es un viaje al interior del sistema solar, una fantástica aventura para niños y jóvenes con la que aprender divirtiéndose.
 Probad a catapultaros al espacio para conocer las maravillas de los planetas y el Sol, ver cómo se mueven y aprender con sus curiosidades y los descubrimientos. Su sencilla interfaz y la voz del narrador os guiarán por el espacio. Comenzad este extraordinario viaje intergaláctico de aprendizaje y podréis:
 - EXPLORAR cada planeta para conocerlos mejor y estudiar sus características, todo gracias a cuatro secciones de aprendizaje (estructura, satélites, curiosidades y viajes y descubrimientos).
 - JUGAR realizando misiones diferentes para cada planeta con tu nave espacial.
 - DESCUBRIR curiosidades e información sobre los planetas a través de cuestionarios que os permiten llevar a cabo una misión secreta sobre el planeta que hayáis elegido.

it.name: Cosmolander
it.short_description: Cosmolander offre la possibilità di fare un viaggio educativo interstellare senza precedenti e si rivolge a bambini dai 6 anni in su che amano lo spazio e l’astronomia, perfetto anche per chi non ha mai messo il naso fuori dal nostro pianeta!
it.long_description:
Cosmolander è un viaggio all'interno del sistema solare, una fantastica avventura per bambini e ragazzi con cui imparare divertendosi.
 Provate a catapultarvi nello spazio per conoscere le meraviglie dei pianeti e del Sole, vedere come si muovono e arricchirvi di curiosità e scoperte. La sua interfaccia amichevole e la voce narrante vi guideranno nello spazio. Iniziate questo viaggio intergalattico all'insegna dell'apprendimento e potrete:
 - ESPLORARE i singoli pianeti per conoscerli meglio e studiarne le caratteristiche, tutto grazie a 4 sezioni di approfondimento (struttura, satelliti, curiosità e viaggi e scoperte).
 - GIOCARE svolgendo delle Missioni differenti per ogni pianeta con la vostra navicella spaziale.
 - SCOPRIRE curiosità e informazioni sui pianeti attraverso quiz che vi permetteranno di compiere una missione segreta sul pianeta da voi scelto.

name: Ludo Hero
short_description: Play Ludo against friends online
long_description: Ludo Hero, modern version of the royal game of Pachisi has arrived. It's a game which was played among Indian kings and queens in ancient times. Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game. No complicated login screens. Just enter your username and play against the world. Play with your friends in a 2-player or 4-player mode. Features: - Chat with your friends in real-time - Feeling lazy? Use the autoplay function - Server side cheat detection - Play online against friends or offline against bots or computers

name: Spot The Difference
short_description: Hurry, time is running out!
long_description: Quick! Find the 3 differences between the two pictures. Scan the picture quickly, to determine what is different. Can you solve the puzzle before the time runs out? Features: - Very easy one touch controls. Suitable for all ages and families - Multiple puzzles to solve - Fun and relaxed theme - Use hints to help you. Beware, they reduce the time remaining significantly!

name: Captain Snowball.io
short_description: Throw snowballs at your friends in this multiplayer IO game
long_description: Throw snowballs at your friends! Pick one of 4 different characters. Eliminate other players to win, in this winter xmas warfare. Features: - Intuitive controls, for desktop, smartphones and tablets - Leaderboards - Custom emoticons - Powerups such as health kits and double damage - Hide behind structures to take cover. Surprise your friend with a snow ball straight in the face! - Switch between different servers for reduced latency (Europe and Asia)

name: Fill The Gap
short_description: Drag and drop blocks to score
long_description: Drag and drop the blocks to fill the gaps. Complete a row to score points. Complete 2 rows or more to score bonus points. How high can you score? Features: - Interactive tutorial - Endless gameplay. Play until you run out of turns. - Zen theme to encourage focus and productivity. - Learn the concept of space management. Fans of tetris and trixology will love this.

name: Draw One Line
short_description: Connect dots without lifting a finger
long_description: Connect the dots to form a line, without ever lifting your finger or mouse. How many levels can you complete? Features: - Interactive tutorial - Over 120 challenging levels to keep you occupied - Fun theme - How difficult can this be? Just Draw 1 Line!

name: Pro Wrestling Action
short_description: Be the last man standing
long_description: Get ready to rumble! Punch, kick, and wrestle your way through to be the last man standing. Knock out your opponents, then throw them out of the ring! Need to perform a spectacular feat? Climb the ropes, time your jumps and dive on the opponent. Collect coins to upgrade your favourite wrestler in the shop. Features: - Simple controls to maximize fun. Start kicking and punching right away! - Entertaining wrestling theme - Clever and not so clever computer opponents. Just like on TV! - Fight, collect coins, upgrade then fight again! Spend hours playing the game. - Fill up your rage meter, and performing unstoppable RAGE attacks. Fans of WWE, WCW, WWF and UFC will love the game.

name: Christmas Tree Fun
short_description: Chop the christmas tree
long_description:
Tis is the season for christmas trees. Join Santa's and his favourite pastime of christmas tree chopping. Chop left, chop right and avoid the branches. How high is your score?
Features:
Beautiful christmas theme and music
Unlock 3 different characters: Santa, skinny Santa and Elf
Increasingly difficult as you progress

name: Ravensworth High School Story
short_description: Choose your own adventure
long_description: You're Liz, and this is your first day at Ravensworth Academy, the elite high school for the country's best and brightest. Embark on a journey of self-discovery, family, friendship, camaraderie, love and drama in this latest high school themed visual novel. Features: - High school theme and graphics, suitable for a teen and young women audience - Linear and non-linear storyline - Collect stars, hearts and coins - Ability to resume story from previous saved point

name: Basketball Legend
short_description: Practice your hoop shots
long_description: Be the basketball legend that you are. Practice your hoop shots with the coach. When you're ready, compete with our battle hardened AI. Can you score more than the AI? Features: - Fun pixel artwork and theme - Simple controls : just swipe to shoot - A tutorial to ease the learning curve - Training and competition mode

name: My Pet Spa
short_description: Take care of pets in your spa
long_description:
Play as a pet spa owner. Our pet needs attention and love from you. Get hands on, as you brush, clean, blow-dry, cut the nails, and dress up the pet. A lot of fun guaranteed for kids, girls and the entire family.
Features:
4 cute animals (kitten, dog, baby bear and baby lion)
5 different pet grooming techniques
A large wardrobe : dress up your pet with the cutest clothing and accessories
Take a picture function
Save your creations to the gallery

name: Muay Thai Training
short_description: Kick and punch banana tree
long_description: You wish to become the greatest muay thai fighter of all time? Start with banana trees. Punch, kick and knee your way to score points. Just like how Buakaw does it in Thailand. Features: - Interactive tutorial - Simple tap gameplay - Unlock advanced characters Shaolin and James - Kickboxing or Thai inspired music for martial arts fans

name: Pilot Training
short_description: Train to be an airplane pilot
long_description:
Attention junior pilot! You are training to be the best airplane pilot in the world.
Embark on a variety of missions aimed at testing your handling and flexibility.
Features:
Fun theme suitable for all ages
Pilot logbook for keeping scores
Random missions include avoiding obstacles, tracking targets, collecting stars and harvesting fuel
Easy and intuitive touch controls
A shop to unlock different airplanes

name: Hearts Connect
short_description: Connect the hearts
long_description: Match 3 hearts of the same color. Meet the minimum hearts required for each level. Twist and turn your brain to match 3 or more hearts. Don't run out of moves! Features: - Interactive tutorial, guided by 2 lively characters - Over 36 challenging match 3 levels - Learn new matching abilities along the way - Encounter tricky match three puzzle sets - Fun and uplifting theme suitable for everyone

name: New York Jigsaw Puzzle
